com.here.android.mpa.isoline

Class IsolineRouter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.isoline.IsolineRouter

  • public class IsolineRouter
extends java.lang.Object
    Isoline calculation executor. Defines concrete calculation method and response listener.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  IsolineRouter.Connectivity
      The possible types of connectivity for isoline calculation

    • Constructor Detail

      • IsolineRouter

        public IsolineRouter()
        Default constructor with IsolineRouter.Connectivity.DEFAULT. Multiple IsolineRouters can be created to calculate multiple isolines in parallel.

    • Method Detail

      • calculateIsoline

        public void calculateIsoline(IsolinePlan plan,
                             IsolineRouter.Listener listener)
        Invokes an asynchronous isoline calculation. Upon completion of the request, the Listener will be invoked regardless if the request is completed successfully or not.
        Parameters:
        plan - A IsolinePlan for the Isoline
        listener - A Listener for the IsolineRouter

      • setConnectivity

        public IsolineRouter setConnectivity(IsolineRouter.Connectivity connectivity)
        Determines whether isoline is calculated online or offline. Default is IsolineRouter.Connectivity.DEFAULT. If set to offline, it will attempt to calculate the isoline offline regardless of the isoline type and regardless of whether there is enough map data for the isoline calculation, if fails, it will not make another attempt online. If set to online, it will attempt to calculate the isoline online regardless of the isoline type and regardless of the current device connectivity. If it fails, it will not make another attempt offline. If this is changed after calling calculateIsoline, the change will not take effect for the current route calculation.
        Parameters:
        connectivity - The IsolineRouter.Connectivity to set
        Returns:
        This IsolineRouter to be used for route calculation
        Note:
        An example of the usage is as follows: e.g. An app wishes to try online first and falls back to offline if online fails. Such app will set connectivity to IsolineRouter.Connectivity.ONLINE before calculating a isoline, if this fails, it will change connectivity to IsolineRouter.Connectivity.OFFLINE before another isoline calculation attempt.

      • getConnectivity

        public IsolineRouter.Connectivity getConnectivity()
        Gets the connectivity to be used for isoline calculation.
        Returns:
        IsolineRouter.Connectivity to be used for isoline calculation

      • isBusy

        public boolean isBusy()
        Queries whether the isoline calculation is ongoing.
        Returns:
        true if a isoline calculation is ongoing, false otherwise.

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        Cancels the current isoline calculation. Note that this API is asynchronous as it takes some time cancel all underlying operations. Use #isBusy() to check whether calculation is still ongoing or not.
